Balancess and splits dataset

Source: R/train_test_balance.R
train_test_balance.Rd

Balancess and splits dataset

train_test_balance(data, y, type, balance = TRUE, fractions = c(0.6, 0.2, 0.2))

Arguments

data

data source, it can be of every format
y

string, target column
type

string, determines if future task is `classification` or `regression`
balance

logical, determines if we want to balance the dataset
fractions

vector, 3 numeric values that sum up to 1 which determine sizes of train, test, validation datasets. DEFAULT: c(0.6,0.2,0.2)

Value

list of train test and validation datasets

Examples

data(lisbon)

#> Warning: data set 'lisbon' not found
b_lisbon <- train_test_balance(lisbon,'Price',balance = FALSE,'regression',
fractions = c(0.6, 0.2, 0.2))

#> Error in train_test_balance(lisbon, "Price", balance = FALSE, "regression",     fractions = c(0.6, 0.2, 0.2)): nie udało się znaleźć funkcji 'train_test_balance'
